event.description: Yunel Escobar walks.
Kole Calhoun lines out to center fielder Rajai Davis. Yunel Escobar to 2nd.
Mike Trout lines out to right fielder Mark Canha.
Albert Pujols lines out to right fielder Mark Canha.
C. J. Cron lines out sharply to right fielder Mark Canha.
Ben Revere grounds out to first baseman Ryon Healy.
Andrelton Simmons singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Mark Canha. Andrelton Simmons advances to 2nd, on a fielding error by right fielder Mark Canha.
Cliff Pennington walks.
Carlos Perez flies out to center fielder Rajai Davis.

Yunel Escobar singles on a sharp ground ball to right fielder Mark Canha, deflected by center fielder Rajai Davis. Yunel Escobar advances to 2nd, on a missed catch error by center fielder Rajai Davis.
Kole Calhoun grounds out to first baseman Ryon Healy. Yunel Escobar to 3rd.
Mike Trout walks.
Albert Pujols grounds out, second baseman Adam Rosales to first baseman Ryon Healy. Yunel Escobar scores. Mike Trout to 2nd.
C. J. Cron flies out to left fielder Khris Davis.
Ben Revere grounds out, second baseman Adam Rosales to first baseman Ryon Healy.
Andrelton Simmons grounds out, third baseman Trevor Plouffe to first baseman Ryon Healy.
Cliff Pennington grounds out, first baseman Ryon Healy to pitcher Andrew Triggs.
Carlos Perez grounds out, third baseman Trevor Plouffe to first baseman Ryon Healy.
Yunel Escobar grounds out sharply, second baseman Adam Rosales to first baseman Ryon Healy.
Kole Calhoun flies out to right fielder Mark Canha.
Mike Trout grounds out, third baseman Trevor Plouffe to first baseman Ryon Healy.
Albert Pujols strikes out swinging.
C. J. Cron singles on a line drive to right fielder Mark Canha.
Ben Revere singles on a line drive to left fielder Khris Davis. C. J. Cron to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Liam Hendriks replaces Andrew Triggs.
Angels challenged (force play), call on the field was upheld: Andrelton Simmons grounds into a force out, shortstop Marcus Semien to second baseman Adam Rosales. Ben Revere out at 2nd.
Defensive Substitution: Yonder Alonso replaces first baseman Ryon Healy, batting 5th, playing first base.
Cliff Pennington strikes out swinging.
Carlos Perez strikes out swinging.
Yunel Escobar grounds out, shortstop Marcus Semien to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Pitching Change: Santiago Casilla replaces Liam Hendriks.
Kole Calhoun strikes out swinging.
Mike Trout grounds out to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Albert Pujols pops out to first baseman Yonder Alonso in foul territory.
Pitching Change: Sean Doolittle replaces Santiago Casilla.
C. J. Cron strikes out on a foul tip.
Ben Revere called out on strikes.
Andrelton Simmons singles on a line drive to left fielder Khris Davis.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Danny Espinosa replaces Cliff Pennington.
With Danny Espinosa batting, Andrelton Simmons advances to 2nd on defensive indifference.
Danny Espinosa strikes out swinging.
Rajai Davis strikes out on a foul tip.
Marcus Semien walks.
Jed Lowrie strikes out swinging.
With Khris Davis batting, Marcus Semien steals (1) 2nd base.
Khris Davis walks.
Ryon Healy flies out to right fielder Kole Calhoun.
Trevor Plouffe grounds out, third baseman Yunel Escobar to first baseman C. J. Cron.
Mark Canha flies out to center fielder Mike Trout.
Josh Phegley pops out to first baseman C. Cron.
Adam Rosales singles on a line drive to right fielder Kole Calhoun.
Rajai Davis pops out to first baseman C. J. Cron in foul territory.
Marcus Semien singles on a line drive to center fielder Mike Trout. Adam Rosales scores. Marcus Semien to 3rd. Fielding error by center fielder Mike Trout.
Jed Lowrie walks.
Khris Davis out on a sacrifice fly to right fielder Kole Calhoun. Marcus Semien scores.
Ryon Healy homers (2) on a fly ball to left center field. Jed Lowrie scores.
Trevor Plouffe lines out to center fielder Mike Trout.
Mark Canha lines out to center fielder Mike Trout.
Josh Phegley flies out to center fielder Mike Trout.
Adam Rosales strikes out swinging.
Rajai Davis grounds out, third baseman Yunel Escobar to first baseman C. J. Cron.
Marcus Semien lines out to right fielder Kole Calhoun in foul territory.
Jed Lowrie strikes out swinging, catcher Carlos Perez to first baseman C. Cron.
Khris Davis doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Ben Revere.
Ryon Healy strikes out swinging.
Trevor Plouffe singles on a line drive to center fielder Mike Trout. Khris Davis scores.
Pitching Change: Blake Parker replaces Tyler Skaggs.
Mark Canha strikes out swinging.
With Josh Phegley batting, wild pitch by Blake Parker, Trevor Plouffe to 2nd.
Josh Phegley strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Yusmeiro Petit replaces Blake Parker.
Adam Rosales grounds out, second baseman Cliff Pennington to first baseman C. J. Cron.
Rajai Davis strikes out swinging.
Marcus Semien strikes out swinging.
Jed Lowrie strikes out swinging.
Khris Davis grounds out, shortstop Andrelton Simmons to first baseman C. J. Cron.
Yonder Alonso walks.
Trevor Plouffe called out on strikes.
